Apostle Islands National Lakeshore

August 12, 2013

Day trip to the sea caves on the Apostle Islands National Lakeshore.

---------------------
getting all our gear on
my boat mate Nathan and I on our way
Rosie. One of our intrepid leaders
we just paddled through 'the keyhole' arch on the right
more cliffs
preparing to enter "the crack"
inside the crack
---------------------

That’s it. Back on the road.

To Lake Superior
